column14: Samsung Galaxy Note 3 Release Date | Samsung Galaxy Note 3 Release Date | India
column15: Samsung Galaxy Note 3 is expected to release in the mids of 2013. Check out for the price and features of the all new Samsung Galaxy Note 3.
column17:
Samsung is trying to thin the line between phones and tablets by increasing the display of phones. This will be verified if the rumors of Samsung Galaxy Note 3 with 6.3 inch display come true. Samsung’s admiration for bigger screen is already apparent with its earlier launched products but it may cross the boundaries with its upcoming creation.

Samsung Galaxy Note 2 entered the market with 5.5 inch display but its follow-up seems to be coming up with something extra something large! And with the arrival of this bigger screen phone Samsung may embrace the new term in the market i.e. ‘phablet’. The term is already introduced but it will become more popular if Samsung Galaxy Note 3 comes with 6.3 inch display.

The minimum display of tablets is 7 inch while the display of phones is much less in comparison. However if display size of phone that is closer to tablet hits market it will perfectly justify the name ‘phablet’. The same is expected to happen with the arrival of Samsung Galaxy Note 3 with which rumors of bigger screen are associated. Besides a bigger screen it will be an organic light-emitting diode (OLED).

Samsung Galaxy Note 3 may snatch a few prospective tablet buyers with its bigger display. Customers who believe that tablets are not easy to hold in hand may opt for to Samsung Galaxy Note 3. However the number of such buyers will be a few because this feature cannot lure the customers who are strictly looking for tablet.

The bigger display of Galaxy Note 3 has induced so much excitement that its other features are going unnoticed. There is no word on Samsung Galaxy Note 3 features in the market; only the display has become the talk of the town. Let’s see whether this rumor turn true or it just remains as a rumor. And if it turns true what will be the reaction of customers towards it. So many questions are hitting mind but they can only be answered with the arrival of Samsung Galaxy Note 3. So let’s just wait and watch!

The phone features- 6.3 inch display & OLED Screen.

Status- Rumor Expected Price- N/A
